summary: An Ordinance amending Sections three, four, five and six of Ordinance No. 13403, entitled "An Ordinance authorizing the revision and codification of the ordinances of the City of Seattle, providing for the appointment of a code commissioner, creating an advisory board, defining the powers and duties of such commissioner and advisory board in carrying out the provisions of this ordinance, providing for the payment of the cost thereof and making an appropriation therefor", approved March 12, 1906.
